metadata.title: CVE-2024-46772 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: Check denominator crb_pipes before used[WHAT & HOW]A denominator cannot be 0, and is checked before used.This fixes 2 DIVIDE_BY_ZERO issues reported by Coverity.

criterions.comment: linux-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
